name: Chad Flame - The Ultimate Man
description:
Battle the masculinity of the prolific Chad Flame in this short puzzle platformer with a humorous narrative.

Collect various flavours of Chad-Cola that each give you different abilities that when combined, allow you to be stronger together.

Made for the Brakeys 2021 game Jam in 1 week.

Coding by Sam Barnsby..

Art and video by Adam Womersley.

Chad Flame Voice Over by Joel Macklin.
